text: Tara Donna Reid (born November 8, 1975 in Wyckoff, New Jersey) is an American actress. She made her movie debut in the 1987 horror movie A Return to Salem's Lot. She had a recurring role on the television show, Scrubs as Danni Sullivan. She is best known for her role as Victoria 'Vicky' Lathum in the American Pie movie series. From August 18 - September 2, 2011, she was a housemate in Celebrity Big Brother UK. ==Filmography== * A Return to Salem's Lot (1987) - Amanda * The Big Lebowski (1998) - Bunny Lebowski * Girl (1998) - Cybil * I Woke Up the Day I Died (1998) - Prom Queen/Nightclub Bartender * Urban Legend (1998) - Sasha Thomas * Cruel Intentions (1999) - Marci Greenbaum * Around The Fire (1999) - Jennifer * American Pie (1999) - Victoria 'Vicky' Lathum * Body Shots (1999) - Sara Olswang * Dr. T & the Women (2000) - Connie * Just Visiting (2001) - Angelique * Josie and the Pussycats (2001) - Melody Valentine * American Pie 2 (2001) - Victoria 'Vicky' Lathum * National Lampoon's Van Wilder (2002) - Gwen Pearson * Devil's Pond (2003) - Julianne (straight-to-video) * My Boss's Daughter (2003) - Lisa Taylor * Alone in the Dark (2005) - Aline Cedrac * The Crow: Wicked Prayer (2005) - Lola Bryne * Silent Partner (2005) - Dina (straight-to-video) * Incubus (2006) - Jay (straight-to-video) * If I Had Known I Was a Genius (2007) - Stephanie (straight-to-video) * 7-10 Split/Strike (2007) - Lindsay/Lil Reno (straight- to-video) * Senior Skip Day (2008) - Ellen Harris (straight-to-video) * Clean Break/Unnatural Causes (2008) - Julia McKay (straight-to-video) * Land of Canaan (2010) - Amy (post-production) * Last Call (2010) - Lindsay (post- production) * The Fields (2011) - Bonnie (post-production) * Sharknado * Sharknado 2: The Second One == Other websites == * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Celebrity Big Brother contestants Category:People from Wyckoff, New Jersey Category:American child actors Category:21st-century American actors
title: Tara Reid
